definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: She was twirling her hair absentmindedly.
sentences.chinese: 她心不在焉地捲曲自己的頭髮。

sentences.english: For once, you seem not to mind.
sentences.chinese: 只有一次，你看起來心不在焉。

sentences.english: It is bad manners to be absent-minded when other people talk to you.
sentences.chinese: 別人同你講話時出心不在焉是沒禮貌的。

sentences.english: The absentminded student consents to the sentence in the presence of me.
sentences.chinese: 心不在焉的學生在我面前批准這份裁決。

sentences.english: His absent-mindedness during work caused a great loss to the company.
sentences.chinese: 他工作時心不在焉，給公司造成了很大損失。

sentences.english: We already agreed to face the world in languor, absentmindedly.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經同意在倦怠面對世界，一邊心不在焉。

sentences.english: “No，” said the young man absently，“I lost．”
sentences.chinese: “不，”年輕人心不在焉地說，“我輸了。”

sentences.english: The worker was absent-minded for he was ill.
sentences.chinese: 這個工人因爲病了，所以有點心不在焉的。

sentences.english: She calls out to her children almost absently.
sentences.chinese: 她心不在焉地召喚她的孩子。

sentences.english: The shock of losing my purse cured me of all my former absent-mindedness.
sentences.chinese: 失去錢包的打擊，使我一改過去心不在焉的壞毛病。

sentences.english: Papa seemed distracted, but he whirled her around the floor expertly .
sentences.chinese: 爸爸有些心不在焉，但他熟練地帶着她在地板上旋轉。

sentences.english: He looked absentmindedly here and there only to see nothing.
sentences.chinese: 他心不在焉地東瞧西看，什麼也沒看見。

sentences.english: I said the wrong thing, acted too desperate, or wasn’t interested enough.
sentences.chinese: 我說錯話，表現急躁，或者心不在焉。

sentences.english: He swallows, sticks another apple in his mouth and chews, again absentmindedly .
sentences.chinese: 他吞下蘋果，又往嘴裏塞了一個，心不在焉地嚼着。
只是你發現自己恍恍惚惚心不在焉了。

definition: to be preoccupied (idiom)/to be inattentive/to be frightened out of one's mind
listless/dispirited/washed out/also written 沒精打彩|没精打彩
dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom

pinyin: you3 yi1 da1 mei2 yi1 da1

definition: to look in all directions (idiom)/to glance around
